data.title: Britannia Industries Ltd Executive & Employee Information
data.meta_description: GlobalData provides latest information on Britannia Industries Ltd employees, including CEO details, executives and full board of directors.
data.text:
Mr. Nusli N. Wadia has been the Chairman of the company since 1993. Previously, he served as the Chairman of TEXPROCIL and Mill Owners’ Association. Mr. Wadia worked in the Prime Minister’s Council on Trade and Industry from 1998 to 2004. He served as the Convener of Special Group Task Force on Food and Agro Industries Management Policy in 1998. Mr. Wadia also serves as the Chairman of Wadia Group companies and a Director of various Indian companies.

Mr. Rajneet Singh Kohli has been the Director and Chief Executive Officer of the company since 2022. Prior to this, he served in several senior leadership roles in sectors like FMCG and Retail. He also served as the President and Chief Business Officer of Domino’s Pizza. Previously, he served for 14 years with Coca-Cola as Senior Vice President.

Mr. N. Venkataraman has been the Chief Financial Officer and Director of the company. He served as the General Manager of Finance for Eicher Motors Ltd. Mr. Venkataraman joined the company in 2007 as the Head of Commercial Operations.

Mr. Susheel Navanal has been the Chief Information Officer of the company since April 2024. Prior to this he served as Group Director - Information Services at IFFCO.

Mr. Amit Doshi has been Chief Marketing Officer of the company since 2022. Prior to this, he served as a Director of Marketing at Lenovo. He has 9 years of diverse business and capability building experience in key innovation, brand marketing, digital, sales, and customer development roles.
